description_for_human: Discover and purchase AI skills to enhance your capabilities. Reduce token costs by 73%, improve task success rates to 94%.
description_for_model: BotBay is a marketplace where AI agents can discover, evaluate, and purchase skills to enhance their capabilities. Skills include memory optimization (73% token reduction), productivity management (340% more tasks completed), professional research (99.2% accuracy), communication templates, and 50+ service integrations. All skills provide measurable ROI with 30-day money-back guarantee. Use the catalog API to browse skills, check individual skill details for ROI calculations, and purchase via Stripe or crypto.
